targets.expr:
sum without (cpu,exported_instance, instance, job, monitor, tenant_id)(irate(collectd_cpu_total{job="collectd",monitor="capture",tenant_id="$tenant_id",capture_id=~"$capture_id"}[1m]))  
/ ignoring(type) group_left 
  sum without (cpu, type,exported_instance, instance, job, monitor, tenant_id)(irate(collectd_cpu_total{job="collectd",monitor="capture",tenant_id="$tenant_id",capture_id=~"$capture_id"}[1m]))
